global.welcome: Welcome to Finnu! Pawn an item easily from home

kyc.NOT_STARTED_DISPLAY_TEXT: This only takes a few moments - click “Verify Me”
kyc.INPUTS_NOT_COMPLETED: Thank you for starting the KYC process! Kindly complete all the inputs
kyc.REVIEW_IN_PROGRESS: Thank you for submitting KYC details! They are being reviewed.
kyc.NOT_VERIFIED: Thank you for submitting KYC details! We are not able to verify the information/documents submitted by you. Kindly re-submit the information by clicking on “Verify Me”
kyc.EXITED: Thank you! Come back later to complete the verification process.
